extendedInfo.description: Bugbox puts JIRA in your pocket. Helps you stay on top of issues even when offline!Background updates, notifications, intuitive interface - all together provide a seamless experience.Requires SOAP plugin. Feel free to email us for help!JIRA is a trademark of Atlassian. Bugbox is not affiliated in any way with them.https://picasaweb.google.com/getbugbox/BugboxForJIRAAndroid#

reviews.title: Features very limited
reviews.comment: We have custom fields in our jira server which display jumbled for an issue and doesn\'t display any values.  I purchased it, but I don\'t find ot useful enough.
reviews.author: Ryan Moquin

reviews.title: Great JIRA app
reviews.comment: Just simple to use and keeps up to date with my tickets. Easy configuration.
reviews.author: A Google User
